price: 41. To mpe tokotombola yo na likolo (koboma yo), mpe ya sólo, tokosilana na bango.
arabic: فَإِمَّا نَذۡهَبَنَّ بِكَ فَإِنَّا مِنۡهُم مُّنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-immā nadhhabanna bika fa-innā min'hum muntaqimūna
